publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6912 Elaine Smith: Well Done Ricky—That the Parliament congratulates Coatbridge boxer Ricky Burns on winning the WBO World super-featherweight championship; notes that he is currently Scotland’s only world boxing champion, and wishes him a long and successful reign.

S3M-6912 Well Done Ricky (lodged on 6 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Stewart Maxwell*, Ken Macintosh*, Bob Doris*, Mary Mulligan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Margaret Mitchell*, Jackie Baillie*, Mike Pringle*, David Whitton*, Michael McMahon*, Bill Butler*, Pauline McNeill*, Brian Adam*
S3M-6912 Well Done Ricky (lodged on 6 September 2010) Bill Kidd*, Helen Eadie*, Jack McConnell*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-6912 Well Done Ricky (lodged on 6 September 2010) Hugh Henry*
